details.title: Clear apt-get caches
alerts: Use 'rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists' after 'apt-get install|update' : /bin/sh -c apt update  && apt -y -q install build-essential libssl-dev libffi-dev python3-dev cargo                           libjpeg-dev libpq-dev postgresql-client curl git python-pip                           vim libcurl4-openssl-dev uwsgi uwsgi-plugin-python                           python-dev libxml2-dev libxslt1-dev libyaml-dev
Use 'rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists' after 'apt-get install|update' : /bin/sh -c curl -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_12.x | bash -     && apt-get install -y nodejs

details.title: Create a user for the container
alerts: Last user should not be root

details.title: Enable Content trust for Docker
alerts: export DOCKER_CONTENT_TRUST=1 before docker pull/build
